mapper.select: select group_no, group_leader, deadline, max_people, g.view, g.status, product, price, c.category_no, c.category_name from dogather.group AS g left join category as c on g.category_no = c.category_no
mapper.insert:
insert into dogather.group (group_leader, category_no, deadline, max_people, status, product, detail, link, origin_price, price) values (#{groupLeader}, #{categoryNo}, #{deadline}, #{maxPeople}, #{status}, #{product}, #{detail}, #{link}, #{originPrice}, #{price})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into dogather.user_group (user_no, group_no, group_leader, product_no) values (#{userNo}, #{groupNo}, #{groupLeader}, #{productNo})
